content.text: Hi! I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I like candy and soda, but I am allergic to milk. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. What about you?

I am a YouTube who hunts, bikes and studies my way through my day, thanks to my loving family. I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time. I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister. I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.

That sounds like a busy life! I am glad you have a loving family. I wish I could meet my dad one day. I am also glad you have a parrot to keep you company. I love pizza too! What kind is your favorite?
Pepperoni and pineapple is my favorite. I also like bacon, olives, spinach, and mushrooms.
Yummy! I love all of those toppings. I also love sausage and green peppers.
We should have a pizza party sometime!
That would be fun! I am free on Saturday.
Me too! I will bring the pizza
